languages.text: "Смерть!.. Тебе!.." {n}Даже сломленный, узник умудряется мстительно улыбнуться.{/n} "Фальшивый капитан... Верные уже нацелили на тебя удар. Пришел приказ добывать... оружие, чтобы в час судный руки праведных не были пусты!"

"Death! Yours..." {n}Even broken, he musters a spiteful sneer.{/n} "Fake captain... The faithful are already aiming for your heart. I was ordered... to stockpile weapons, so that when the fateful hour comes, the righteous would not stand unarmed!"
languages.original_text: "Смерть!.. Тебе!.." {n}Даже сломленный, узник умудряется мстительно улыбнуться.{/n} "Фальшивый капитан... Верные уже нацелили на тебя удар. Пришел приказ добывать... оружие, чтобы в час судный руки праведных не были пусты!"

"Death! Yours..." {n}Even broken, he musters a spiteful sneer.{/n} "Fake captain... The faithful are already aiming for your heart. I was ordered... to stockpile weapons, so that when the fateful hour comes, the righteous would not stand unarmed!"

languages.text: «¡Muerte! La tuya...». {n}Incluso destrozado, consigue esbozar una sonrisa rencorosa.{/n} «Lord Capitán fals{mf|o|a}... los fieles ya apuntan a tu corazón. Se me ordenó... hacer acopio de armas, para que, cuando llegara el momento fatídico, ¡los justos estuvieran preparados!».
languages.original_text: "Death! Yours..." {n}Even broken, he musters a spiteful sneer.{/n} "Fake captain... The faithful are already aiming for your heart. I was ordered... to stockpile weapons, so that when the fateful hour comes, the righteous would not stand unarmed!"

traits.locale_text: «¡Muerte! La tuya...». {n}Incluso destrozado, consigue esbozar una sonrisa rencorosa.{/n} «Lord Capitán fals{mf|o|a}... los fieles ya apuntan a tu corazón. Se me ordenó... hacer acopio de armas, para que, cuando llegara el momento fatídico, ¡los justos estuvieran preparados!».

languages.text: 「死！お前は…」{n}壊れても、男は嫌味に鼻で笑う。{/n}「フェイク・キャプテンが…信者は既にお前の心臓を狙っている。私は…武器の備蓄を命じられた。運命の時が来たとき、正しい者が丸腰で立ち向かうことがないようにな！」
languages.original_text: "Death! Yours..." {n}Even broken, he musters a spiteful sneer.{/n} "Fake captain... The faithful are already aiming for your heart. I was ordered... to stockpile weapons, so that when the fateful hour comes, the righteous would not stand unarmed!"

traits.locale_text: 「死！お前は…」{n}壊れても、男は嫌味に鼻で笑う。{/n}「フェイク・キャプテンが…信者は既にお前の心臓を狙っている。私は…武器の備蓄を命じられた。運命の時が来たとき、正しい者が丸腰で立ち向かうことがないようにな！」

languages.text: “我们要你死……”{n}这个人已经不成人形，但还是发出了充满恶意的冷笑。{/n}“虚假的舰长……那些信徒已经瞄准了你的心脏。我负责……囤积武器，这样一来，命运的时刻到来时，正义之人便不会手无寸铁！”
languages.original_text: "Death! Yours..." {n}Even broken, he musters a spiteful sneer.{/n} "Fake captain... The faithful are already aiming for your heart. I was ordered... to stockpile weapons, so that when the fateful hour comes, the righteous would not stand unarmed!"

traits.locale_text: “我们要你死……”{n}这个人已经不成人形，但还是发出了充满恶意的冷笑。{/n}“虚假的舰长……那些信徒已经瞄准了你的心脏。我负责……囤积武器，这样一来，命运的时刻到来时，正义之人便不会手无寸铁！”

languages.text: "Tod! Euer ..." {n}Selbst gebrochen bringt er noch ein verächtliches Grinsen zustande.{/n} "Falscher Captain ... Die Gläubigen zielen bereits auf Euer Herz. Ich hatte Befehl ... Waffen zu sammeln, damit die Rechtschaffenen nicht unbewaffnet sind, wenn die schicksalhafte Stunde kommt!"
languages.original_text: "Death! Yours..." {n}Even broken, he musters a spiteful sneer.{/n} "Fake captain... The faithful are already aiming for your heart. I was ordered... to stockpile weapons, so that when the fateful hour comes, the righteous would not stand unarmed!"

traits.locale_text: "Tod! Euer ..." {n}Selbst gebrochen bringt er noch ein verächtliches Grinsen zustande.{/n} "Falscher Captain ... Die Gläubigen zielen bereits auf Euer Herz. Ich hatte Befehl ... Waffen zu sammeln, damit die Rechtschaffenen nicht unbewaffnet sind, wenn die schicksalhafte Stunde kommt!"

languages.text: « La mort ! La vôtre... {n}Même brisé, il parvient à esquisser un rictus haineux.{/n} Misérable imposteur... L'arsenal des fidèles est d'ores et déjà braqué sur votre cœur. On m'a ordonné... de faire des stocks d'armes afin que les justes puissent défendre leur foi à l'heure fatidique ! »
languages.original_text: "Death! Yours..." {n}Even broken, he musters a spiteful sneer.{/n} "Fake captain... The faithful are already aiming for your heart. I was ordered... to stockpile weapons, so that when the fateful hour comes, the righteous would not stand unarmed!"

traits.locale_text: « La mort ! La vôtre... {n}Même brisé, il parvient à esquisser un rictus haineux.{/n} Misérable imposteur... L'arsenal des fidèles est d'ores et déjà braqué sur votre cœur. On m'a ordonné... de faire des stocks d'armes afin que les justes puissent défendre leur foi à l'heure fatidique ! »

languages.text: "Ölüm! Senin ölümün..." {n}Tüm cesareti kırılmış olsa da kin dolu bir gülümsemeyi esirgemiyor.{/n} "Uydurma kaptan... İnançlılar, çoktan yüreğini hedef aldılar. Bana... Silahları istiflemem emredildi. Bu sayede kader anı geldiğinde erdemlilerin ellerinden silah eksik olmayacak!"
languages.original_text: "Death! Yours..." {n}Even broken, he musters a spiteful sneer.{/n} "Fake captain... The faithful are already aiming for your heart. I was ordered... to stockpile weapons, so that when the fateful hour comes, the righteous would not stand unarmed!"
